item.content:encoded: Steve Martin and singer-songwriter Edie Brickell are set to release their first collaborative LP Love Has Come for You on April 23rd through Rounder Records Comprising 13 new songs that combine Martin's banjo work with Brickell's lyrics and vocals you can now get a taste of the record's unique sound...
